snippet.title: Reborn: A Samurai Awakens｜Official Trailer｜PSVR
snippet.description:
We just moved. Go there to visit our official channel! 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqZmnpTja0F23VUivoHSaiA



This is the official trailer for Reborn: A Samurai Awakens, brought to you by WinkingCorp.

Set in the year 2480, A Samurai Awakens is filled with armor-clad sword-swinging alien machines and laser-shooting flying eyes. And evil samurai. And ninjas.
Also, robotic mechanized cyborg dual-wielding gun-slinging laser blade psychic power slice-n-dice sumo wrestler boss fighting pandemonium action in spades.

Players take the role of Yukimura Sanada, the famous samurai warrior of Feudal Japan, resurrected to fight against extraterrestrial invaders of earth. Yukimura is armed with dual laser katanas, pistols and psychic powers at his disposal. Each hand can also wield a different weapon, so players can choose between a sword-and-gun stance, sword plus psychic power, or just go all-out with dual katanas or dual guns.

Awards:
*2016 Best Hard Core price at VR Core
*2016 Year best VR game at VRDC and China VR game summit 
*2017 PAX East Best VR game

FEATURES
* Strategically wield laser katanas or beam pistols, or a combination of both in each hand!
* In addition to weapons, players can also use psionic powers.
* Activate “Hack Time” to set enemies in slow motion and deal double damage.
* Enter special QTE commands during Boss Fights to turn the tide of battle


Genre: Adventure, FPS, thriller, Horror, Action


Read more about the story of Reborn: A Samurai Awakens


Reborn: A Samurai Awakens will be on PSVR.
